mapper.insert: INSERT INTO InbodyInfo (customerID, identifyNumber, height, weight, BMI, basalMetabolicRate, gender, checkDate) VALUES ( #{customerID}, #{identifyNum}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bmi}, #{bmr}, #{gender}, TO_DATE(#{record_date}, 'yy/MM/dd') )
INSERT INTO friends(friendID, customerID) VALUES ( #{customerID}, -- friendID와 customerID 위치를 바꾸어 입력 #{friendID} -- friendID와 customerID 위치를 바꾸어 입력 )
mapper.select: SELECT hc.name, hc.customerID FROM hanacustomer hc JOIN friends f ON hc.customerID = f.friendID WHERE f.customerID = #{customerID}
select healthgrade from healthgrade where customerID = #{customerID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM inbodyinfo h INNER JOIN healthgrade g ON h.CUSTOMERID = g.CUSTOMERID INNER JOIN CustomerTargetDiet d ON h.CUSTOMERID = d.CUSTOMERID WHERE h.CUSTOMERID = #{customerID} ORDER BY h.CHECKDATE ASC -- 정렬 기준을 지정해주세요 ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT C.CUSTOMERID, C.INSURANCESTARTDATE, C.INSURANCEENDDATE, C.INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER, I.INSURANCECOMPANYCODE, I.INSURANCEPRODUCTNAME, I.INSURANCEFEE, I.INSURANCECOMPANYNAME, I.INSUCONTENT, I.MINAGEATREGISTRATION, I.MAXAGEATREGISTRATION FROM customerInusMapping C INNER JOIN gradeinsurance I ON C.INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER = I.INSURANCEPRODUCTNUMBER WHERE C.CUSTOMERID = #{customerID}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO healthgrade hg USING dual d ON (hg.CUSTOMERID = #{customerID}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET hg.HEALTHGRADE = #{healthGrade}, hg.REGISTRATIONDATE = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (GRADEID, CUSTOMERID, HEALTHGRADE, REGISTRATIONDATE) VALUES (health_grade_sequence.NEXTVAL, #{customerID}, #{healthGrade}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT hc.NAME, hg.CUSTOMERID, hg.HEALTHGRADE FROM hanacustomer hc INNER JOIN healthgrade hg ON hc.CUSTOMERID = hg.CUSTOMERID WHERE hc.CUSTOMERID = #{customerID}
SELECT HEALTHGRADE, COUNT(*) AS GRADE_COUNT FROM HEALTHGRADE GROUP BY HEALTHGRADE order by healthgrade
